content: HAC-V Top-of-slab rebar channel for corners Cast-in anchor channels in standard sizes and lengths for top-of-slab corner applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchor channels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Higher shear load resistance due to confinement of concrete edge PROFIS Anchor Channel software – provides a more efficient design method based on ESR-3520 and principles of AC232 and ACI318, including at slab corners Increased design freedom – solution for designs where standard HAC anchor channel reaches application limits Suitable for small edge distances and thin concrete slabs Available for different edge distances, already set for quicker installation Applications Installing curtain wall brackets on anchor channels in top-of-slab position, especially in building corners Fastening to thin concrete slabs Seismic-relevant applications and 3D loads ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized Channel profile: HAC-V 50 EDGE C PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized | Channel profile | HAC-V 50 EDGE C | PROFIS Software | Yes | Product type | Anchor channel ### ITEMS- 2366635 -
